verses.name: Genesis 42:30
verses.text: The man, who is the lord of the land, spake roughly to us, and took us for spies of the country.

verses.name: Genesis 42:31
verses.text: And we said unto him, We are true men; we are no spies:

verses.name: Genesis 42:32
verses.text: We be twelve brethren, sons of our father; one is not, and the youngest is this day with our father in the land of Canaan.

verses.name: Genesis 42:33
verses.text: And the man, the lord of the country, said unto us, Hereby shall I know that ye are true men; leave one of your brethren here with me, and take food for the famine of your households, and be gone:
